entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
